weather.question: I fall from the sky, and I'm wet and cold. Sometimes I turn into snow. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come down when the clouds are full.
☔️ You need an umbrella when I am falling.
🌧️ I'm not sunshine, but I'm important for plants!

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and fall from the sky when it's very cold. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of tiny ice crystals.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when you play in me.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow and shine in the sky. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I give you warmth and light.
😎 You need sunglasses on a bright day with me.
🌻 Flowers love to grow towards me.

weather.question: I blow through the trees and can be gentle or strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make leaves dance.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
💨 I can make your hair move.

weather.question: I am a big, white, fluffy thing that floats in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain.

hints.text: 🐑 I look like cotton candy.
🌧️ When I'm dark, it might rain.
☁️ I can hide the sun.

weather.question: I come after a storm, and I have many colors in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I look like a colorful arc.
☀️ You need sunshine and rain for me to appear.
🔴 My colors are red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.

weather.question: I am a loud noise and bright flash during a thunderstorm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡️ I am electricity in the sky.
🌩️ Be careful and stay inside during me.
💥 I often come with thunder.

weather.question: I am a very strong storm with a spinning cloud. I can cause a lot of damage.

hints.text: 🌪️ I have a funnel shape.
⚠️ You need to take shelter when I'm near.
💨 I spin very fast and can lift things into the air.

weather.question: I am a long period of time with very little or no rain. The ground gets very dry.

hints.text: 🌵 Plants struggle to grow during me.
🔥 The risk of wildfires increases.
🏜️ Sometimes rivers and lakes dry up because of me.

weather.question: I'm a storm that forms over warm ocean waters. I have strong winds and heavy rain.

hints.text: 🌀 I have a swirling eye in the middle.
🌊 I can cause big waves and flooding on the coast.
🧭 My name starts with H in the Atlantic Ocean.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am a favorite food of a certain animal.
💛 My color is similar to the sun.
✂️ You need to take off my jacket before you can eat me.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies! What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I am a liquid that comes from an animal.
🥛 People often pour me in a glass.
🍪 I taste good with baked treats.

food.question: I am red and juicy, and grow on a tree. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I'm a popular fruit.
🌳 You can find me growing high up.
👩‍⚕️ There's a saying about eating me and seeing a doctor.

food.question: I am long and orange and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 A bunny's favorite snack.
🥕 I grow in the ground.
🥕 I'm a crunchy vegetable.

food.question: I am round and flat. I'm covered in sauce and cheese. You bake me in the oven. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I am a popular Italian dish.
🍕I am often cut into triangles.
🔥 You need to cook me to be ready to eat.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I come from far away.
🥝 My insides are a beautiful color!
🥝 You can find me in the store.

food.question: I am made from potatoes and fried in oil. I am often served with ketchup. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I am a very popular side dish.
🔥 I taste better when hot.
🧂 Salt makes me even more yummy.

food.question: I am a grain that comes in brown or white, and I am often served with curry or stir-fry. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I am often eaten with chopsticks.
🌾 I come from a plant.
🥘 I am a staple food for many cultures.

food.question: I am a dessert that is cold and sweet. I come in many flavors and people love me especially on hot days. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I can be served in a cone.
🌈 You can mix all kinds of flavors of me!
🥶 You can keep me in the freezer.

food.question: I am a vegetable that makes some people cry when you cut me. I have many layers and a strong smell. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I grow underground.
😭 Cutting me can make you sad... or at least make you cry!
🧅 I am often used to add flavor to dishes.
